item.title: Road illigally blocked (assume stolen sign), 24th March
item.description:
The coordinates are 51.8167109, -2.0165126 The start of the green lane has been blocked with some bits of broken timber, a load of March has been dumped on top and some bits of hedging top it off, with a bent roadsign, presumably liberated for elsewhere.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colesbourne, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road works with traffic lights Swindon lane, 24th March
item.description:
No workman at roundabout, temporary traffic lights and traffic using Paddocks Lane as a shortcut , itâ€™s using the road like a racetrack and with the very poor condition of the surface in Paddocms Lane when will it come to an end

item.title: Poor Road Markings, 24th March
item.description:
Road markings along Pittville Crecent lane alllow all residents and non-residents ( particulary these) to flout the area's parking and severely compromise this two-way street to become a one-way street with traffic backing up many times during the day
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Pittville Crescent, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The whole road is a pothole., 24th March
item.description:

item.title: Dead trees, 24th March
item.description:
There are two trees next to the garages on Ewens Road that appear to be dead. They have been stable so far but we are concerned that they may fall and cause damage in the near future

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Ewens Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 24th March
item.description:
Customer reports that the road is becoming dangerous and it needs resurfacing as there are now so many pot-holes; a car was badly damaged 2 weeks ago. They would like to meet someone so she can point out all the problem areas.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 24th March
item.description:
Vehicle registration number EX 69 EPOhas been abandoned on the carport at the back of my property. The vehicle does not belong to anyone in my family. It has appeared over the weekend. The carport is at the back of my shop and is used by myself, staff. Disabled customers and students and also by my husband who is a disabled badge holder. The property is at 253 Gloucester Road Cheltenham GL518NW. This is not just an inconvenience. But causes a lot of problems in running my business

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 253, Gloucester Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
